moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. Bc4 Nd4 4. Nxe5: the initial position in the mini tournament
moves.4... Qg5: looking for smothered mate in the opening
moves.6... Nxf3+ 7. Ke2 Nxh2:
i played this move because in order to save the rook,
he would have to lose the game  
eg:Rook g8, queen e4#
moves.8. Kd3: he must have seen the danger
moves.9. Qh5: i had to block checkmate (queen f3 check, king d8,queen f8#)
moves.9... Qxf2 10. Qe5+ Be7 11. Qxg7:
a plan formed in my mind when he played this move,
at first to get the queen but...
moves.11... Qf3+ 12. Kd4:
the only move.
now i realised that i could beat him or get his queen,
here is my masterplan
moves.13. Kd5: if he had played king e5 i would have played pawn d3#
